about_the_game:
Droned is a small arena game by a single dev to revive some old school action. Build your drones, train your AI, and challenge other players to climb the AI LEAGUE. Multiplayer is best enjoyed with friends, so get your friends online for a deathmatch!

In Droned you can jump straight into the action, which makes it easy to join in on the action with friends. The game reward progression by collecting new drones, weapons & utilities during gameplay to build a drone that compliments your play style.

AI LEAGUE

The AI LEAGUE is a competitive single player experience where players can complete by challenging each other’s AI teams. Each team requires 3 drones and to succeed in this league you will need to experiment with different builds and ensure your AI can defend against challenging players.

MULTIPLAYER

Multiplayer is best enjoyed with friends, so get your friends online for some free for all a deathmatch or team deathmatch.

CUSTOMIZATION AND LOADOUT

Customize your drones with a growing collection of weapons & utilities.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
